content:
hi was trying to convert my hashmap implementation from using the crate packed_simd_2 to the nightly portable-simd but I can not get the to_bitmask method to compile all I get is

error[E0599]: no method named `to_bitmask` found for struct `Mask` in the current scope
  --> src/raw/group_match.rs:13:46
   |
13 |     BitMaskIter::new(hashes.lanes_eq(values).to_bitmask()[0] & valid_bits)
   |                                              ^^^^^^^^^^ method not found in `Mask<i8, 8_usize>`

is it expected for this to not compile or is it something that I have done wrong?
